Rawlinson and Bosworth Professor of Anglo-Saxon

wikitext.*:
'''Charles Leslie Wrenn''' ([[1895]]â€“[[1969]]) was a fellow [[Inklings|Inkling]] with [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]. He became [[Rawlinson and Bosworth Professor of Anglo-Saxon]] at the [[University of Oxford]] in [[1945]], the successor in the chair to J.R.R. Tolkien, a post he held until 1963.
